name: Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea
about: What it is:A multipurpose, hydrating, cooling cucumber face mist with aloe vera and antioxidant peppermint water to visibly awaken dull-, tired-looking skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Dullness.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Peppermint Essential Water: Is an antioxidant-rich ingredient with a visibly invigorating kick..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Infused with a refreshing cucumber, green tea fragrance, this cooling mist delivers antioxidant-rich hydration for awake-looking skin with a dewy finish. Add a soothing spritz to your face, neck, or hairu2014anytime, anywhere.
ingredients: -Peppermint Essential Water: Is an antioxidant-rich ingredient with a visibly invigorating kick.  .-Cucumber Essential Water and Cucumber Extract: Hydrate and provide a rich supply of amino acids..-Bladderwrack (Seaweed) Extract: Softens skin and has high mineral levels...Aqua (Water, Eau), Propylene Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Water, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Propanediol, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzophenone-4, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1), Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Mist onto your face, neck, or hair as needed..-Use to boost hydration before or after applying moisturizer, as a pick-me-up on the go, or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish..-If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water...Skin tips:.-For a dewy look, spritz your favorite brush or sponge before blending foundation or concealer. Once you're done, mist your face to add radiance..-For an extra-refreshing and cooling boost, store bottle in your refrigerator.
